name: Dive Brick Oven Mushroom and Turkey Cheese Sub (Top Secret Recipe)
instructions: For the sauce combine cream, cheese, and butter in small pan over medium heat and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
If you don’t want to go through the effort, just buy a can of Campbell’s cheddar cheese soup and heat up.
Sauté the mushroom slices in the butter and season with salt and pepper.
Heat the breast in the microwave until warm.
Cut the baguette so that with the top off it looks like a “v” but do not cut all the way through.
Inside the v Spread some of the cheese sauce, turkey breast more cheese sauce, mushrooms.
Put Swiss or provolone on top and bake 2 minutes more until the cheese melts.
Put top on and slice in half for eating.
I generally just use sub buns.
